description:
At tennis camp, Hikaru sees Kyosuke and Madoka practicing and gets the wrong idea, and a playboy tennis captain decides to try and take advantage of the situation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikaru Mokugeki! Gasshuku wa Kiken ga Ippai
Hikaru Witnesses! The Camp is Full of Dangers!
Hikaru vede tutto! Un campo estivo irto di pericoli
ひかる目撃!合宿は危険がいっぱい
